biotools.summary: Contains a set of function to compute mutual information matrices from continuous, categorical and survival variables. It also contains function to perform feature selection with minimum Redundancy, Maximum Relevance (mRMR) and a new ensemble mRMR technique.

bioschemas.name: mRMRe
bioschemas.summary: Contains a set of function to compute mutual information matrices from continuous, categorical and survival variables. It also contains function to perform feature selection with minimum Redundancy, Maximum Relevance (mRMR) and a new ensemble mRMR technique.
